authors.name: Brandon Sanderson
authors.bio: American author of epic fantasy and science fiction.

authors.name: Agatha Christie
authors.bio: English writer known for her detective novels.

authors.name: George R. R. Martin
authors.bio: Author of A Song of Ice and Fire series.

authors.name: J.K. Rowling
authors.bio: British author, best known for the Harry Potter series.

authors.name: Stephen King
authors.bio: American author of horror, supernatural fiction, suspense, and fantasy novels.

authors.name: J.R.R. Tolkien
authors.bio: English writer, poet, philologist, and academic, best known for The Lord of the Rings.

authors.name: Neil Gaiman
authors.bio: English author of short fiction, novels, comic books, and films.

authors.name: Dan Brown
authors.bio: American author best known for thriller novels.

authors.name: Suzanne Collins
authors.bio: American television writer and author, best known for The Hunger Games trilogy.

authors.name: Haruki Murakami
authors.bio: Japanese writer known for his surreal and melancholic fiction.

books.title: Mistborn
books.description: An epic fantasy novel set in a world ruled by the immortal Lord Ruler.

books.title: The Way of Kings
books.description: The first book in The Stormlight Archive series, full of political intrigue and war.

books.title: Words of Radiance
books.description: Continuation of The Stormlight Archive story with deeper character arcs.

books.title: Murder on the Orient Express
books.description: Detective Hercule Poirot investigates a murder on a train.

books.title: And Then There Were None
books.description: Ten strangers are invited to a remote island where a murder mystery unfolds.

books.title: A Game of Thrones
books.description: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne in the Seven Kingdoms.

books.title: A Clash of Kings
books.description: The sequel to A Game of Thrones, filled with battles and betrayal.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone
books.description: The story of a young wizard discovering his magical heritage.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
books.description: Harry’s second year at Hogwarts brings new mysteries.

books.title: The Shining
books.description: A psychological horror about isolation and madness.

books.title: It
books.description: A group of friends face an ancient evil that resurfaces every 27 years.

books.title: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.description: The first part of The Lord of the Rings trilogy.

books.title: The Two Towers
books.description: The Fellowship is scattered, and war looms over Middle-earth.

books.title: Coraline
books.description: A girl discovers a parallel world that mirrors her own but hides dark secrets.

books.title: American Gods
books.description: A man becomes entangled in a war between old and new gods.

books.title: The Da Vinci Code
books.description: A symbologist uncovers a secret that could shake Christianity.

books.title: Inferno
books.description: Robert Langdon races against time to stop a deadly global plot.

books.title: The Hunger Games
books.description: A dystopian world where teens must fight to the death for survival.

books.title: Catching Fire
books.description: Katniss returns to the Hunger Games as rebellion brews.

books.title: Kafka on the Shore
books.description: A surreal coming-of-age story blending dreams, cats, and metaphysics.
